text: Vernon Stanley Hoium (born March 7, 1930) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota State Senate from 1963 to 1966. He is a lawyer.https://www.leg.state.mn.us/legdb/fulldetail?ID=13379 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Minnesota state senators
title: Vernon Hoium
